name: PM-KISAN Samman Nidhi
benefit_amount: ₹6,000/year in 3 installments of ₹2,000 each
how_to_apply: Visit pmkisan.gov.in or nearest CSC (Common Service Centre)

name: PM Awas Yojana - Gramin (PMAY-G)
benefit_amount: ₹1,20,000 (plain areas) / ₹1,30,000 (hilly/difficult areas) for house construction
how_to_apply: Apply through Gram Panchayat or pmayg.nic.in

name: Ayushman Bharat - PM Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
name_hi: आयुष्मान भारत - प्रधानमंत्री जन आरोग्य योजना
benefit_amount: ₹5,00,000/year health insurance per family for secondary & tertiary hospitalization
how_to_apply: Visit nearest Ayushman Bharat Health & Wellness Centre or pmjay.gov.in

name: PM Ujjwala Yojana 2.0
benefit_amount: Free LPG connection + first refill + stove for BPL households
how_to_apply: Visit nearest LPG distributor or pmuy.gov.in

name: PM Shram Yogi Maan-dhan (PM-SYM)
benefit_amount: ₹3,000/month pension after age 60
how_to_apply: Visit nearest CSC or maandhan.in

name: e-Shram Card
benefit_amount: Accidental insurance of ₹2,00,000 + access to other welfare schemes
how_to_apply: Register at eshram.gov.in or nearest CSC

name: PM MUDRA Yojana
benefit_amount: Business loans: Shishu (up to ₹50,000), Kishore (₹50,000-₹5 lakh), Tarun (₹5-10 lakh) — no collateral
how_to_apply: Apply at any bank branch or mudra.org.in

name: PM Street Vendor's AtmaNirbhar Nidhi (SVANidhi)
benefit_amount: Working capital loan: ₹10,000 (1st), ₹20,000 (2nd), ₹50,000 (3rd) + 7% interest subsidy + cashback for digital payments
how_to_apply: Apply at pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
name_hi: इंदिरा गांधी राष्ट्रीय वृद्धावस्था पेंशन योजना
benefit_amount: ₹200/month (60-79 years) + ₹500/month (80+ years) from Centre + state top-up
how_to_apply: Apply through Gram Panchayat/Block office or nsap.nic.in

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)
name_hi: इंदिरा गांधी राष्ट्रीय विधवा पेंशन योजना
benefit_amount: ₹300/month from Centre + state top-up (varies by state, total ₹500-₹2,500/month)
how_to_apply: Apply through Gram Panchayat/Block office or nsap.nic.in

name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS)
name_hi: इंदिरा गांधी राष्ट्रीय विकलांगता पेंशन योजना
benefit_amount: ₹300/month from Centre + state top-up
how_to_apply: Apply through District Social Welfare Office or nsap.nic.in

name: PM Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)
benefit_amount: ₹5,000 for first child + ₹6,000 for second (girl child) — for pregnancy and institutional delivery
how_to_apply: Register at nearest Anganwadi Centre or pmmvy.wcd.gov.in

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
benefit_amount: High-interest savings account (8.2% p.a.) for girl child — matures at age 21
how_to_apply: Open account at any post office or authorized bank

name: PM Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
benefit_amount: Crop insurance at subsidized premium: 2% (Kharif), 1.5% (Rabi), 5% (commercial/horticulture) — full sum insured on crop loss
how_to_apply: Apply through bank or pmfby.gov.in before seasonal deadline

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
benefit_amount: Short-term crop loan at 4% interest (with subsidy) — up to ₹3 lakh; includes fishery & animal husbandry
how_to_apply: Apply at any bank branch or through PM-KISAN portal

name: Stand-Up India
benefit_amount: Bank loans between ₹10 lakh - ₹1 crore for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs for greenfield enterprise
how_to_apply: Apply at standupmitra.in or any SIDBI office

name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
benefit_amount: Guaranteed pension of ₹1,000-₹5,000/month after age 60 based on contribution
how_to_apply: Enroll through any bank branch or online banking

name: MGNREGA (Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act)
benefit_amount: 100 days guaranteed wage employment per year at ₹200-₹350/day (varies by state)
how_to_apply: Register at Gram Panchayat to get Job Card, then demand work in writing

name: PM Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
benefit_amount: Zero-balance bank account + RuPay debit card + ₹2 lakh accidental insurance + ₹30,000 life insurance + ₹10,000 overdraft facility
documents: Aadhaar Card (or any one document for KYC)
how_to_apply: Visit any bank branch with Aadhaar

name: PM Vishwakarma Yojana
ministry: Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
benefit_amount: ₹15,000 toolkit grant + skill training + loan up to ₹3 lakh at 5% interest for artisans and craftspeople
how_to_apply: Register at pmvishwakarma.gov.in through CSC

name: PM Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana (PMGKAY) / National Food Security Act
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
benefit_amount: 5 kg free foodgrain (rice/wheat) per person per month for priority households
how_to_apply: Collect from nearest Fair Price Shop (ration shop) using ration card

name: PM POSHAN Abhiyaan (Mid-Day Meal Scheme)
benefit_amount: Free cooked nutritious meal for children in government schools (Class 1-8)
how_to_apply: Automatically provided in government and aided schools

name: Pre-Matric & Post-Matric Scholarship for SC/ST Students
benefit_amount: ₹3,500-₹13,000/year scholarship + hostel allowance for SC/ST students (Class 9 onwards)
how_to_apply: Apply at scholarships.gov.in (National Scholarship Portal)

name: PM Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY)
benefit_amount: ₹2,00,000 life insurance cover at just ₹436/year premium — any cause of death
how_to_apply: Enroll through any bank branch or net banking

name: PM Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
benefit_amount: ₹2,00,000 accidental death/disability cover at just ₹20/year (cheapest insurance in India)
how_to_apply: Enroll through any bank branch or net banking

name: Ladli Behna Yojana (Madhya Pradesh)
benefit_amount: ₹1,250/month (₹15,000/year) direct cash transfer to women
how_to_apply: Apply at nearest camp/Gram Panchayat or cmladlibahna.mp.gov.in

name: KALIA Scheme (Odisha)
benefit_amount: ₹25,000/season (₹50,000/year) for cultivators + ₹12,500/year for landless families
how_to_apply: Apply at kalia.odisha.gov.in

name: Rythu Bandhu (Telangana)
benefit_amount: ₹5,000/acre/season (₹10,000/year) for farming investment
how_to_apply: Apply at rythubandhu.telangana.gov.in

name: BC Sakhi Yojana (Banking Correspondent)
benefit_amount: ₹4,000/month stipend for 6 months + commission on transactions for women as banking agents in villages
how_to_apply: Apply through State Rural Livelihood Mission (SRLM)

name: Samagra Shiksha Abhiyan
benefit_amount: Free textbooks, uniforms, and transport allowance for government school students
how_to_apply: Benefits provided automatically through schools

name: Jal Jeevan Mission
benefit_amount: Tap water connection (55 liters per person per day) to every rural household
how_to_apply: Contact Gram Panchayat or jaljeevanmission.gov.in

name: Saubhagya - PM Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana
benefit_amount: Free electricity connection to all unelectrified households — BPL families get free connection with LED bulbs, fan, and wiring
how_to_apply: Contact nearest electricity office/DISCOM or saubhagya.gov.in

name: Swachh Bharat Mission - Free Toilet Construction
benefit_amount: ₹12,000 for individual household toilet construction (IHHL)
how_to_apply: Apply through Gram Panchayat or sbm.gov.in

name: PM Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
ministry: Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
benefit_amount: Subsidy of 25-35% (rural) / 15-25% (urban) on bank loans up to ₹50 lakh for new manufacturing/service units
how_to_apply: Apply at kviconline.gov.in

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)
benefit_amount: ₹1,500/month stipend sharing by Government + basic training for apprentices
how_to_apply: Register at apprenticeshipindia.gov.in

name: National Rural Livelihood Mission (DAY-NRLM) - Self Help Groups
name_hi: दीनदयाल अंत्योदय योजना - राष्ट्रीय ग्रामीण आजीविका मिशन
benefit_amount: Revolving fund ₹10,000-₹15,000 per SHG + bank loans at subsidized rates + skill training + market linkage
how_to_apply: Contact nearest Block Mission Management Unit or nrlm.gov.in

name: Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS) - Anganwadi
benefit_amount: Supplementary nutrition, immunization, health checkup, pre-school education for children (0-6 years) and pregnant/lactating women
how_to_apply: Visit nearest Anganwadi Centre

name: PM KUSUM Yojana
benefit_amount: 60% subsidy (30% Central + 30% State) on solar pumps for farmers — for irrigation
how_to_apply: Apply through state DISCOM/renewable energy department or mnre.gov.in

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
benefit_amount: Free soil testing and health card with crop-wise fertilizer recommendations — issued every 2 years
how_to_apply: Contact Block Agriculture Office or soilhealth.dac.gov.in

name: Antyodaya Anna Yojana (AAY)
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
benefit_amount: 35 kg rice at ₹3/kg or wheat at ₹2/kg per family per month — for the poorest of the poor
how_to_apply: Apply at Block/Tehsil food office for AAY ration card
